p: The blood was collected from decapitated fetuses at E18.5 or from new born pups or one-day-old pups. The maternal milk was harvested from one-day-old pup’s milk spot. After centrifugation of the harvested milk at 12,000 rpm, the supernatant was collected and inactivated at 56 °C for 30 min prior to neutralizing antibody test. All antibody neutralization titers were determined using an mCherry ZIKV as described above.
